description: These tuna poke cups are a little taste of Hawaii.
name: Ahi Tuna Poke Cups Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large mango, de-stoned, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chopped tuna, spring onions, soy sauce, toasted sesame oil, sriracha and ginger in a bowl, toss well to coat, cover and set aside for 20 minutes.

Pre-heat the oven to 170°C/150°C fan-forced. Spray a 12 hole muffin tray with canola oil and press a wonton wrapper into each to form a cup shape. Bake for 6-7 minutes until lightly golden and crisp. Leave to cool for 10 minutes in the muffin tray.
Stand each wonton cup upright on a platter, spoon in the tuna and spring onion mix, top with mango and avocado and serve.
